testsuite.name: Test Cities displayed on Search
testsuite.system-out: Scenario: Test correct cities are displayed # src/test/resources/Funtionaltest/QTripCities.feature:5 Given Setup Base URl # cucumberapi.stepDefinitions.Steps.setup_base_u_rl() When Send the Get request with endpoint # cucumberapi.stepDefinitions.Steps.send_the_get_request_with_endpoint() 200 Then Validate Response Statucode # cucumberapi.stepDefinitions.Steps.validate_response_statucode() City is Bengaluru and description is 100+ Places And Validate Response body details # cucumberapi.stepDefinitions.Steps.validate_response_body_details()
